root.name: Cooking Mama
root.description: Cooking Mama is a game where your goal is to successfully make food by using the stylus. By adhering to what the Mama wants you to make, you progress through each culinary assignment and thus the game. Each dish is put together through a series of minigames normally lasting less than ten seconds. There are over seventy five dishes to create and three different games modes to choose from. On Feb. 27, 2009, Cooking Mama was made available on the App Store for the iPhone and iPod Touch.
